Sentencas: Solid oxide electrolysis cell is a highly promising technology for CO2 electrolysis and has attracted wide attention.
Titulo: Long-term stability of carbon dioxide electrolysis in a large-scale flat-tube solid oxide electrolysis cell based on double-sided air electrodes

Sentencas: But the durability is insufficient by known designed structure of solid oxide electrolysis cell due to structure damage.
Titulo: Long-term stability of carbon dioxide electrolysis in a large-scale flat-tube solid oxide electrolysis cell based on double-sided air electrodes

Sentencas: In this work, a new flat-tube solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) based on double-sided air electrodes with mechanically-strong redox properties and larger active area was proposed and applied to electrolysis of CO2, and its electrochemical performance and long-term durability were investigated.
Titulo: Long-term stability of carbon dioxide electrolysis in a large-scale flat-tube solid oxide electrolysis cell based on double-sided air electrodes

Sentencas: The results showed that the charging current density reaches -600 mA/cm(2) at 1.5 V and 750 degrees C under H-2/CO2 atmosphere.
Titulo: Long-term stability of carbon dioxide electrolysis in a large-scale flat-tube solid oxide electrolysis cell based on double-sided air electrodes

Sentencas: The CO2 conversion rate achieves 47.4% with energy conversation efficiency of 91.4% at the electrolysis voltage of 1.305 V under the charging current density of -400 mA/cm(2), corresponding to 210 mL/min of CO production rate.
Titulo: Long-term stability of carbon dioxide electrolysis in a large-scale flat-tube solid oxide electrolysis cell based on double-sided air electrodes

Sentencas: This new cell architecture for CO2 electrolysis was stable at the current density of -300 mA/cm(2) for 1910 h at 750 degrees C with a degradation rate of 4.89%/kh.
Titulo: Long-term stability of carbon dioxide electrolysis in a large-scale flat-tube solid oxide electrolysis cell based on double-sided air electrodes

Sentencas: The new flat-tube solid oxide electrolysis cell is capable to conduct CO2 electrolysis with high efficiency and long-term stability.
Titulo: Long-term stability of carbon dioxide electrolysis in a large-scale flat-tube solid oxide electrolysis cell based on double-sided air electrodes
